GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiInlineLvlSdt class.

SetLock.name: SetLock
SetLock.description: Sets the lock to the current inline text content control: "contentLocked" - content cannot be edited. "sdtContentLocked" - content cannot be edited and the container cannot be deleted. "sdtLocked" - the container cannot be deleted.

params.name: sLockType
params.description: The lock type applied to the inline text content control.

GetLock.name: GetLock
GetLock.description: Returns the lock type of the current container.

SetTag.name: SetTag
SetTag.description: Adds a string tag to the current inline text content control.

params.name: sTag
params.description: The tag which will be added to the current inline text content control.

GetTag.name: GetTag
GetTag.description: Returns the tag attribute for the current container.

SetLabel.name: SetLabel
SetLabel.description: Adds a string label to the current inline text content control.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The label which will be added to the current inline text content control. Can be a positive or negative integer from -2147483647 to 2147483647.

GetLabel.name: GetLabel
GetLabel.description: Returns the label attribute for the current container.

SetAlias.name: SetAlias
SetAlias.description: Sets the alias attribute to the current container.

params.name: sAlias
params.description: The alias which will be added to the current inline text content control.

GetAlias.name: GetAlias
GetAlias.description: Returns the alias attribute for the current container.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Returns a number of elements in the current inline text content control. The text content control is created with one text run present in it by default, so even without any element added this method will return the value of '1'.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Returns an element of the current inline text content control using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the element which content we want to get must be located.

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Removes an element using the position specified from the current inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element which we want to remove from the current inline text content control.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Removes all the elements from the current inline text content control.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Adds an element to the inline text content control.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the position specified. Returns false if the type of oElement is not supported by an inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element where it will be added to the current inline text content control. If this value is not specified, then the element will be added to the end of the current inline text content control.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Adds an element to the end of inline text content control.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added to the end of the container.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Adds text to the current content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text which will be added to the content control.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Removes a content control and its content. If keepContent is true, the content is not deleted.

params.name: keepContent
params.description: Specifies if the content will be deleted or not.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Applies text settings to the content of the content control.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The properties that will be set to the content of the content control.

GetParentParagraph.name: GetParentParagraph
GetParentParagraph.description: Returns a paragraph that contains the current content control.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Returns a content control that contains the current content control.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a table that contains the current content control.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Returns a table cell that contains the current content control.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified content control.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of an inline content control. Ignores comments, footnote references, complex fields.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiInlineLvlSdt object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteStyles
params.description: Specifies if the used styles will be written to the JSON object or not.

GetPlaceholderText.name: GetPlaceholderText
GetPlaceholderText.description: Returns the placeholder text from the current inline content control.

SetPlaceholderText.name: SetPlaceholderText
SetPlaceholderText.description: Sets the placeholder text to the current inline content control. Can't be set to checkbox or radio button

params.name: sText
params.description: The text that will be set to the current inline content control.

IsForm.name: IsForm
IsForm.description: Checks if the content control is a form.

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to the current inline content control. Please note that this inline content control must be in the document.

GetDropdownList.name: GetDropdownList
GetDropdownList.description: Returns a list of values of the combo box / dropdown list content control.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a container for the paragraph elements.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a container for the paragraph elements.
